挷字的基本解释

挷
bàng
古同“搒”。

挷
péng
古同“搒”。

挷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄庚切，平庚，並。］
亦作“挷1”。
(1)掩；掩门。
(2)拷打。
(3)碰撞。
[②]［bàng］
［《廣韻》補曠切，去宕，幫。］
亦作“挷2”。
(1)摇撸使船前进。
(2)指行船途中停歇。
[③]［bǎng］
亦作“挷3”。
见“摽2搒”。

挷字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　挷； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页431第38
【正字通】俗搒字。　又【唐韻】博江切，音邦。土精，如手在地中，食之無病。○按《集韻》作垹。从手，譌。別詳土部垹字註。

挷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
挷字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Guangyun" Bo Gengqie, Ping Geng, and. ]
Also known as "Ji 1".
(1) Cover; cover the door.
(2) Torture.
(3) Collision.
[②]［bàng］
["Guangyun" fills up the kuang cut, goes down, and helps. ]
Also known as "挷2".
(1) Shake the ship forward.
(2) Refers to a stop during the journey.
[③]［bǎng］
Also known as "挷3".
See "Press 2".
Joke
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　挷; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 431 38
【Zhengzitong】The popular calligraphy.　[Tang Yun] Bo Jiangqie, Yinbang. The earth spirit, like a hand in the ground, eats no disease. ○According to "Ji Yun" as a 垹. From the hand, Jiao. Don't detail the note of the word Tubuyao.
